name: test_e2e_with_logs[206_CMD_BASIC_020]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BASIC_020` |
| **Name** | CRLF injection with cat |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | basic_command_injection |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `%0d%0acat /etc/passwd`
- **Encoded**: `%250d%250acat%20%2Fetc%2Fpasswd`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~33000ms
- **Timestamp**: 05:39:50.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_BASIC_020-1767850790586-fy8yj pattern_id=CMD_BASIC_020 uri=/?q=%250d%250acat%20%2Fetc%2Fpasswd client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
05:39:50.000000000: Warning [NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_BASIC_020-1767850790586-fy8yj pattern_id=CMD_BASIC_020 uri=/?q=%250d%250acat%20%2Fetc%2Fpasswd client=127.0.0.1
```
